text: @AdamParkhomenko Vietnam 3yrs 1967 - 1969 we lost 39361. Covid19 killed 40000 in 3 months. Those protesting at the Trump Rent a Protest or complaining on social media. I wonder how you would act if we had a Draft process to serve in the ER like thousands of 18 - 25yr olds sent to die in Vietnam.
